definition: to gasp for breath/to take a breather
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]

sentences.english: The man was trying to say something, but he was only wheezing.
sentences.chinese: 那個男人想要說些什麼，但他只能喘息。

sentences.english: It's the final gasp of the burst housing bubble.
sentences.chinese: 它是房地產泡沫破滅前的最後一次喘息。

sentences.english: But Mr Yudhoyono now has the breathing-space to try.
sentences.chinese: 但如今，Yudhoyono先生還是有喘息機會的。

sentences.english: Use of a desiccant breather keeps air entering a reservoir clean and dry.
sentences.chinese: 使用了乾燥劑喘息的空氣不斷進入油箱的清潔及乾燥。

sentences.english: One flight up Dalla ran, and paused for a moment, panting.
sentences.chinese: 德拉一口氣跑上一段樓梯，喘息着歇了一會兒。

sentences.english: We were awakened by the whoops of the sick baby.
sentences.chinese: 生病嬰兒的喘息聲把我們弄醒了。

sentences.english: Results Both the amount and the frequency of Wheeze outbreak were greatly less in treatment group than that in control group.
sentences.chinese: 結果治療組喘息發作的人數及次數明顯低於對照組。

sentences.english: From the kitchen, Where Shuyu was cooking, came the coughing of the bellows.
sentences.chinese: 淑玉在做飯，竈屋傳來風箱的喘息。

sentences.english: He is suddenly hard to join Luo's smoke one shot, fight for a short moment breather of time.
sentences.chinese: 他猛然硬接羅雲一擊，爭取了片刻喘息時間。

sentences.english: They attacked all along the line and gave the enemy no breathing spell.
sentences.chinese: 他們發起全線總攻，不給敵人以任何喘息機會。

sentences.english: It would be nice to get a breather.
sentences.chinese: 要是能有個喘息時間就好了。

sentences.english: The pizza deliveryman took a few last gasps and died on the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 這位披薩快遞員喘息了幾下，最後死在了人行道上。

sentences.english: GASP】The policeman heard the gasps of a boy in the smoky room.
sentences.chinese: 救火員聽到冒煙的房間裏有個男孩的喘息聲。

sentences.english: Are You a Sneezer, Wheezer, Sniffer, or Dripper?
sentences.chinese: 你會打噴嚏，喘息，用鼻子吸氣或流鼻涕嗎？

sentences.english: He was puffing hard when he jumped on to the bus.
sentences.chinese: 他跳上公共汽車時喘息不已。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tomake much value on the infection to MP in children's the gasping quality disease .
sentences.chinese: 結論在兒童喘息性疾病中應重視MP感染。

definition: to get one's breath back/to take a breather
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate
spirit weary, strength exhausted (idiom); spent/drained/washed out
to turn over (when lying)/(fig.) to free oneself/to emancipate oneself/to bring about a change of one's fortunes
